title: The Aeroplane Flies High, Disc 1
description:
Description
The Aeroplane Flies High is a five-disc box set released by American alternative rock band The Smashing Pumpkins in 1996. It contains expanded versions of the five singles from their album Mellon Collie and the Infinite Sadness and also included a 44-page booklet with pictures and writings by the band's lead singer Billy Corgan, as well as lyrics. A limited edition release, the box reached number 42 on the Billboard charts, and sold 300,000 units (1.5 million discs in all), generating a platinum disc for the band.[citation needed] Originally intended to be limited to 200,000 copies, Virgin Records produced more after the original run sold out due to overwhelming and unexpected demand.

Contents

1 Track listing
1.1 2013 CD/DVD reissue
1.2 Promotional releases
2 Personnel
3 Chart positions
4 Notes

All songs written and composed by Billy Corgan, except where noted.
